markers.name: Candikusuma

- Java Bali Cable System (JBCS), RFS 2013, to Java Island
- Jalapati, RFS 2023, to Java Island

markers.name: Jimbaran

- Link 2 Phase-2, RFS May 2005, to Java Island
- JAVALI, RFS December 2011, to Java Island

markers.name: Bali
markers.desc: - Barat Timur Indonesia-2 (BTI-2), RFS 2028, to connect the entire Indonesia

markers.name: Seraya

- Indonesia Global Gateway (IGG) System, RFS May 2018, to connect the entire Indonesia + Singapore
